member.name: NMTOOLBARA
member.summary: Contains information used to process toolbar notification codes. This structure supersedes theTBNOTIFY structure.

member.name: NMTOOLBARA.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMTOOLBARA.iItem
member.summary: Command identifier of the button associated with the notification code.

member.name: NMTOOLBARA.tbButton
member.summary: structure that contains information about the toolbar button associated with the notification code. This member only contains valid information with the TBN_QUERYINSERT and TBN_QUERYDELETE notification codes.

member.name: NMTOOLBARA.cchText
member.summary: Count of characters in the button text.

member.name: NMTOOLBARA.pszText
member.summary: Address of a character buffer that contains the button text.

member.name: NMTOOLBARA.rcButton
member.summary: Version 5.80. A structure that defines the area covered by the button.
